name: identifier
label: Identifier
description: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing. (NCIT:C25364 )

name: acronym
label: Acronym
description: The non-unique initials or abbreviated name used for identification. (NCIT:C93495 )

name: name
label: Name
description: The words or language units by which a thing is known. (NCIT:C42614 )

name: description
label: Description
description: The description of the characteristics that define a cohort. (NCIT:C166209 )

name: principleinvestigator
label: Principle investigator
description: The principle investigator or responsible person for this study. (OMIABIS:0000100 )

name: contactperson
label: Contact person
description: A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group. (NCIT:C25461 )

name: contactemail
label: Contact email
description: An email address for the purpose of contacting the study contact person. (OMIABIS:0000035 )

name: sizeofcohort
label: Size of cohort
description: A subset of a larger population, selected for investigation to draw conclusions or make estimates about the larger population. (NCIT:C53190 )
